text: @realDonaldTrump For once I agree. I’m quite sure that Trump is feverishly working at finding out a way to get his base to sacrifice their lives for his political campaign by packing the churches on Easter in the hope of restarting his failing economy that was already in recession before covid19.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
